entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

entry.em: WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND NEW YEARS DAY
entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40
